p: To visualize the positions of trunk substitutions on the virus surface proteins, amino acid residues were mapped onto the 3-dimensional structure of a Victoria virus HA protein (Protein Data Bank [PDB] ID code 4FQM) and a Yamagata virus NA (PDB ID code 3K36) using the PyMOL program (Molecular Graphics System, version 2.3 Schr√∂dinger, LLC).
